scripts.test:postman: newman run postman_collection.json --environment postman_environment.json --reporters cli,html --reporter-html-export test-reports/report.html
scripts.test:postman:watch: newman run postman_collection.json --environment postman_environment.json --reporters cli,html --reporter-html-export test-reports/report.html --delay-request 1000
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix frontend" "npm run dev --prefix backend"
scripts.setup: npm i && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend && npm run dev
scripts.setup:test: npm install -g newman && npm run test:integration
